rewritten_ads.content:
Autodesk is putting the Flex in flexibility! üöÄ

Pay-as-you-go product access.

Let's goo ‚Äì learn more!

![Autodesk Flex Ad Image](https://imgen.x.ai/xai-imgen/xai-tmp-imgen-cc3fa50b-d5eb-43ce-96c6-48f3ca1e4980.png)
rewritten_ads.image_prompt: A clean, modern screenshot-style image of the Autodesk Flex pay-as-you-go interface on a laptop screen in a casual hacker workspace ‚Äì think xAI hackathon vibes with a crowded desk, coffee mug, stickers on the laptop, and subtle SF Bay Area energy. Bright, energetic colors like blues and whites, enthusiastic mood with a "let's build" feel, simple composition focusing on the flex pricing model text "Pay-as-you-go" highlighted truthfully, no exaggerated elements or fake results, photorealistic social media post style for relatability.
rewritten_ads.enhancement_notes: Makes it more dynamic and conversational to match a tech enthusiast's casual Twitter style (e.g., "let's goo! üöÄ"), amps up the energetic hackathon vibe while staying 100% truthful to original claims; shifts from repetitive corporate to single hype post format for better social flow, keeps core brand elements intact.

rewritten_ads.content:
Autodesk nailed flexibility with Flex! üöÄ

Pay-as-you-go product access.

Let's go build! Learn more.

![Autodesk Flex Ad](https://imgen.x.ai/xai-imgen/xai-tmp-imgen-c789054c-cb4f-4bc9-ab30-5c31e639a474.png)
rewritten_ads.image_prompt: A clean, modern digital illustration in a tech-savvy style: sleek laptop screen displaying Autodesk software icons with glowing flex arrows symbolizing pay-as-you-go access, surrounded by subtle rocket emojis and hackathon-inspired energy like code snippets and builder vibes. Vibrant blues and whites, enthusiastic and professional mood, dynamic composition focusing on flexibility without any exaggerated results or people. Social media optimized, high-contrast for engagement.
rewritten_ads.enhancement_notes: More dynamic and tech-enthusiast vibe than original static image‚Äîadds subtle rocket and builder elements to match user's xAI/hackathon style, emphasizes pay-as-you-go flex visually with arrows/icons, keeps truthful product rep without fabrication.

rewritten_ads.content:
Autodesk nailed flexibility with their pay-as-you-go product access. üöÄ

True flex for devs and builders ‚Äì pay only for what you use.

Learn more: [Autodesk Flex]

![Generated Ad Image](https://imgen.x.ai/xai-imgen/xai-tmp-imgen-65e63e9d-07e7-4022-8614-0d79df2ac273.png)
rewritten_ads.image_prompt: A sleek, modern digital illustration in a tech-hackathon vibe: glowing holographic Autodesk logos and 3D modeling tools (like gears, blueprints, and flexing CAD interfaces) floating dynamically around a central "Pay-as-you-go" token on a dark futuristic background with subtle rocket emojis and neon blues/greens. Energetic composition with clean lines, no people, emphasizing flexibility through fluid, adaptable shapes. High-contrast, social-media optimized for X/Twitter, eye-catching and professional yet enthusiastic.
rewritten_ads.enhancement_notes: More dynamic and tech-enthusiast focused than the original image ‚Äì amps up the futuristic energy with holographic elements and rocket motifs to match the user's hyped AI/hackathon style, while keeping core brand visuals (CAD/tools) truthful and central. Makes it pop on social feeds without exaggeration.
